title: Best Forum Feelings
body:
Seeing 5 messages in updates box, going and looking

http://i.imgur.com/drM30tc.jpg



4/5 are from Riot Girl

http://onproductmanagement.net/wp-content/uploads/2012/05/success3.jpg

replies.body:
I haven't gotten a comment from a rioter yet. 

Dam u are a lucky person.

hi

*drops bacon, flies off*

D: 

Ignore what I just said. XD
Baconhawk always knows how to put some bacon on it and fix eeeeeeverything.

Bacon: "Did you try turning it off and on again?"

User: "Yes, did nothing"

Bacon: "Did you try putting bacon on it"

User: "Whaaaat"

Bacon: yes put bacon on it

User: OMG IT WORKED!

Bacon: *caws happily*
Exactly. I've seen it, you guys. It WORKS EVERY TIME.
I demand imagery evidence.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wSReSGe200A
You beat me to it!

LOL.

LOL as in Laughing, not LoL.

Hey Riot is this why you named ur game League of Legends for the "LoL"?

Hi.

I have no bacon. :-(

Don't worry. I don't necessarily have to have bacon.

Just don't "slack" off that much. 

Or do whatever you want because i can't tell if u "slack" off or not.

:D
He posts where I lurk - Fan Creations.
I guess I check more on live gameplay than fan creations.

Post something that draws attention based off of merit and shown work. If a lot of people like it, chances are a Rioter will too. Rioters are usually simply other forum users when they peruse the posts.
Apparently rioters love what I just said.

I wouldn't say lucky, it's probably a numbers thing. I have boatloads of threads in fan creations, and I spend a lot of time lurking the forums, commenting on other peoples' stuff. 

Humour helps xD
Riot Girl is a sweetie, for sure. Love how involved she is in the community.
Thx! I really, REALLY Loved Dungeons & Demacians. Was so sad the champ pics didn't make it over when we updated forums.

I'm glad you liked them! I was thinking about redoing all of them but the amount of work it took made a lazy-ass like myself go "Aw hell no".

For reference, the easiest/quickest posts took about 10 or so minutes. The most complex took around 3-4 hours, especially considering sometimes all the attachments would reset or just delete themselves.

"Roll for pregnancy"

The swing dance club here, which I am president of has MF and GP dancing on our shirts, and I always think of that line when I wear it.
That's awesome! It really makes me happy that people not only remember it but enjoyed it so much. Who would have thought medication-fueled insanity would make so many people snicker?

So it was really medication-fueled? I wondered about that.

That and the Shyvanna being really upset about the dragon killing, or when Mundo wanted to be DM. And I think one of those is why I call Kog-Maw Koggy.

Mhm. The full story is that (IRL) I was unhappy for a long time with my current major and it all came to a head after I got into a car accident. I was fine mostly but the car was pretty wrecked. So my parents got worried and I went to a psychiatrist to get some anti-depressants.

First time taking such medication and, naturally, went a little overboard. I'm super glad you remember that stuff too, I always wonder if people remember what I did now that you can't really access them anymore.

Swing <3

Swing dance is the best dance.
How about Noxians?
all the upboats to this post
When I had 3 updates and saw they were all from IronStylus. I love VUs more than anything else in this game so I was real hype for him to not only comment, but it also being "VU talk"

lol I find it hard to believe that VUs are your favourite thing about LoL.

but hey, whatever floats your boat.

My favourite part of league is ~~the diversity of champions and play-styles. no game is ever the same. :D never gets boring~~ Riot Girl
AWWWWWWWWW <3
